amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute made in order and considered as adopted pursuant to the order of the House on October 7, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehner amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Boehner.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Boehner.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Boehner amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boehner amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
